items.summary: Fix the Google Maps embed so it reliably points to the exact Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location using ONLY the provided location link (https://maps.app.goo.gl/1nXnfAyBe6BFAnA87), and ensure both the embedded map and the "Open in Google Maps" button open the same correct location (no wrong pin).

Make the Contact page map/location section look more professional and stylish while staying lightweight (no heavy animations), improving spacing, card treatment, and map frame presentation without changing the core content.
